# Show underscore-separated words are allowed when all parts are accepted as correct.
! gospel -camel=false
stdout 'main.go:3:1: "ExampleWholeProgram" is misspelled in comment'
! stderr .

gospel
! stdout .
! stderr .

-- go.mod --
module dummy
-- main.go --
package main

// ExampleWholeProgram
func main() {
}
